SERVICIOS.INTRODUCCION: Exclusive experiences designed for your comfort and satisfaction. Discover what we have to offer.

EXPERIENCIAS.DESCRIPCION: At our hotel, we pride ourselves on offering world-class services designed to meet all your needs. Whether it's relaxing in our spa, enjoying our gastronomy, or exploring our facilities, we have everything you need for an unforgettable stay.

SECCION.DESCRIPCION: Enjoy the best service at the best price during your stay

GASTRONOMIA.INTRODUCCION: Discover the flavors we've prepared especially for you.

SABORES_UNICOS.DESCRIPCION: Our gastronomic selection is designed to delight your palate with fresh ingredients and exquisite recipes. From traditional dishes to international options, our cuisine is an unforgettable culinary experience.

CARTAS.TARIFA: Rate includes breakfast and hotel insurance.
CARTAS.INCLUYE: Includes parking and access to wet areas

ERRORS.DEFAULT: The value of this field is not valid
ERRORS.MINLENGTH: This field must have at least {minlength.requiredLength} characters
ERRORS.MAXLENGTH: This field must have at most {maxlength.requiredLength} characters
ERRORS.PATTERN: The value of this field is not valid
ERRORS.MIN: The value of this field must be greater than or equal to {min.min}
ERRORS.MAX: The value of this field must be less than or equal to {max.max}
ERRORS.TEL_BETWEEN_DIGITS: The phone number must have between {telBetweenDigits.min} and {telBetweenDigits.max} digits
ERRORS.PHONE_DIGITS: Your phone number must have {phoneDigits.digits} digits
ERRORS.IS_NAN: The value of this field must be numeric
ERRORS.FULL_NAME: You must enter a valid name
ERRORS.MIN_CURRENCY: The value of this field must be greater than $ {minCurrency.min}
ERRORS.MAX_CURRENCY: The value of this field must be less than $ {maxCurrency.max}
ERRORS.MAX_ADVANCE: The value cannot exceed your advance availability ($ {maxAdvance.max})
ERRORS.IS_MULTIPLE: The value is not a multiple of $ {isMultiple.multiple}
ERRORS.EMAIL: The value must be a valid email
ERRORS.BETWEEN_AGE: You must be between {betweenAge.min} and {betweenAge.max} years old
ERRORS.VALID_ADDRESS: You must enter a valid address
ERRORS.ALPHANUMERIC: No special characters are allowed, only the hyphen (-)
ERRORS.ONLY_NUMBERS: Only numeric values are allowed in this field
ERRORS.ONLY_LETTERS: Only letters are allowed in this field
ERRORS.HAS_CAPITAL_CASE: This field must contain uppercase letters
ERRORS.HAS_SMALL_CASE: This field must contain lowercase letters
ERRORS.HAS_SPECIAL_CHARACTERS: This field must contain special characters
ERRORS.SIZE: The file is larger than 2 MB
ERRORS.DATE_OUT_OF_RANGE: The date is not in the allowed range
ERRORS.ONLY_ALPHANUMERIC: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed in this field
ERRORS.INVALID_NUMBER: The entered value is not a valid number

TIRAMISÚ.DETALLE: Delicious Italian dessert with coffee and mascarpone.

BRUSCHETTA.DETALLE: Slices of bread with tomato, basil, and olive oil.

RAVIOLIS.DETALLE: Pasta stuffed with cheese and spinach in tomato sauce.

LIMONADA.DETALLE: Refreshing drink made from freshly squeezed lemon.

SERVICIOS_DETALLES.Relaja tus músculos con nuestro masaje d: Relax your muscles with our 1-hour massage.
SERVICIOS_DETALLES.Desayuno completo entregado a tu habitac: Full breakfast delivered to your room.
SERVICIOS_DETALLES.Explora los lugares más emblemáticos con: Explore the most iconic places with an expert guide.

DETALLE_CUARTO.Habitación estándar con cama doble y bañ: Standard room with a double bed and private bathroom.
